#primary, .home.blog #primary, .home.page-template-default #primary {
  float: left;
  width: 100%;
}
.edd-download-cat-free-themes .download-dec form,
.download_category-free-themes .edd_purchase_submit_wrapper,
.forum #subscription-toggle{
	display: none;
}
.edigital_featured_products .product-caption {
    background: #27b6d4 none repeat scroll 0 0;	
	color:#fff;
}
.featured-items-wrapper .prd-title a{
	color:#fff;
}
.mt-edd-cart-btn {
  display: none !important;
}

.freemius-purchase-button {
  background-color: #27b6d4;
  color: #fff;
  padding: 10px 30px;
  border-radius: 5px;
	font-size: 20px;
	border: 1px solid #fff;
}
.freemius-purchase-button:focus,
.freemius-purchase-button:hover {
  background-color: #fff;
  color: #27b6d4;
	border: 1px solid #27b6d4;
}
.single-download .edd_download_purchase_form {
  margin-bottom: 0;
  padding: 2px 2px 1px 20px;
  top: 23px;
  float: left;
  width: auto;
  position: absolute;
  right: 0;
  background-color: #27b6d4;
  border-radius: 5px;
}
.single-download .edd_purchase_submit_wrapper .edd-add-to-cart-label{
	color:#fff;
}
.edd_purchase_submit_wrapper{
	margin-bottom:3px;
	display: inline-block !important;
}
.freemius-price {
  display: inline-block !important;
}
.single-download article .entry-header{
	display: none;
}
.edd_purchase_submit_wrapper .edd-add-to-cart-label {
  font-size: 24px;
}
.edd-btn-page .edd-add-to-cart-label{
	margin-bottom:20px;
